titles.title: Thou Thinkest Lord Of Me (nice easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thou thinkest Lord of me Thou thinkest Lord of me What need I fear since Thou art near And thinkest Lord of me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Amid the trials which I meet Amid the thorns that pierce my feet One thought remains supremely sweet Thou thinkest Lord of me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The cares of life come thronging fast Upon my soul their shadow cast Their gloom reminds my heart at last Thou thinkest Lord of me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let shadows come let shadows go Let life be bright or dark with woe I am content for this I know Thou thinkest Lord or me{/lang-eng}
